label: Fast-Motion
def_question: Is it a fast-motion video with forward playback speed slightly faster than real-time (1x–3x)?
alt_question: Does the scene appear quicker than normal but not as extreme as time-lapse?
Is the motion speed subtly increased to enhance pacing?
Does the video show a slight acceleration of real-time movement?
def_prompt: A fast-motion video with forward playback speed slightly faster than real-time (1x–3x).
alt_prompt: A shot where actions appear slightly accelerated but not time-lapsed.
A scene with movement that is subtly faster than normal speed.
A video where motion is enhanced by slight speed-up effects.
